title: Chair Pads Floor Protectors X-PROTECTOR 48 PCS - Felt Furniture Pads - Premium Chair Feet Protectors - Huge Quantity Floor Protector Pads - Protect Wood Floors with Chair Leg Floor Protector!

✌ PERFECT PACK – round 48 pcs felt furniture pads X-PROTECTOR Premium Quality 25mm chair leg protectors - BEST SIZE to fit most of your home furniture to prevent scratches.

✌ X-PROTECTOR IS A REGISTERED TRADEMARK – AVOID THE COPIES. ORDER IT NOW RISK FREE - PRESS THE BUTTON «ADD TO CART» RIGHT NOW!
description: Product Description MAIN ADVANTAGES OF FURNITURE PADS X- PROTECTOR: HIGH QUALITY – our felt chair pads are made of STRONG HIGH-QUALITY FELT and give to Your floor, furniture and other surfaces caring solid protection. TENACIOUS ADHESIVE - our chair leg floor protectors has TENACIOUS ADHESIVE which keep them on the furniture feet MUCH LONGER than cheap pads. SUITABLE FOR ALL – our wood floor protectors are perfect for any type of chair legs, furniture feet and other home furniture. It’s very easy to stick our hardwood floor protectors to any Your home furniture and items. PERFECT SIZE TO FIT MOST OF YOUR FURNITURE – for total protect of furniture and surfaces in Your home we made big set pf 48pcs of 25mm felt pads. WE LOVE OUR CLIENTS AND DO OUR BEST FOR THEM! First of all, you need to clean the surface of the furniture feet. Then peel the felt pad from the paper and stick it on the feet. WE LOVE OUR CLIENTS AND DO OUR BEST FOR THEM! Our chair leg floor protectors has tenacious adhesive which tightly holds pads on the furniture feet for a long period of time. WE LOVE OUR CLIENTS AND DO OUR BEST FOR THEM! Now no need to repair the damaged floor. Forget about scratches, scuffs and annoying noise when you move chairs and recliners with our felt furniture sliders. WE LOVE OUR CLIENTS AND DO OUR BEST FOR THEM! X-PROTECTOR felt pads perfect for all type of floor: hardwood, laminate, vinyl, tile and others. IF YOU WOULDN’T LIKE TO CONSTANTLY HAVE DEAL WITH SCRATCHES AND SCUFFS ON YOUR WOODEN AND LAMINATE FLOORS AND OTHER FURNITURE, ADD THIS SET TO THE CART RIGHT NOW! ELIMINATE THE POSSIBILITY OF SCRATCHES WITH FELT PADS X-PROTECTOR!
